column4: hi guys, i'm trying to install libgtk2.0-dev package but synaptic gives me a message saying that libgtk needs few packages which are unresolvable!? any ideas how to fix it
can you try the following and paste the text for us on pastebin, sudo aptitude update && sudo aptitude install libgtk2.0-dev
maybe you did not click 'reload' in synaptic recently? that runs aptitude update
